QuestData.Title: Ancient Obstacles
QuestData.Description: For years, this valley has been sealed behind impenetrable gates. Now that the cataclysm has torn them down, the secrets within are ours to discover.$B$BThere are yet some obstacles in the way. From within the gates, the bygone creations of the titans have awoken. They wander aimlessly across the sand, attacking any who approach.$B$BSomeone needs to destroy the golems patrolling the valley; are you up to it?
QuestData.CompletionText: Too many golems still wander the sand, $n.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $c. We would be hard pressed to face such enemies without your assistance.
